name: Long Cat (diaconescuaurelian)
description: Hey there, get ready for a wild ride! Inthis game, you play as a super long cat, cruising around the faces of a 3D cube and munching on some tasty mice. It's like that classic game you know, but with a feline twist. The controls are easy-peasy, and the gameplay is a total blast. This game is perfect for anyone, no matter what your gaming skills are. So what are you waiting for? Let's go on this adventure and see how long you can keep the fun going in this crazy 3D world!
